Xiaomi Tanggapi Redmi Note 8 Pro Sulit Didapat
06 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Foto: Adi Fida Rahman/detikinet

Jakarta - Banyak laporan yang menyebut Redmi Note 8 Pro sulit didapat, bahkan yang telah pre-order offline di toko sekalipun. Lantas apa kata Xiaomi terkait hal tersebut?Pihak Xiaomi rupanya menyadari akan hal itu. Masalah tersebut disebutkan lantaran adanya keterlambatan pengiriman."Kami meminta maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang disebabkan oleh keterlambatan pengiriman pre-order unit Redmi Note 8 Pro di Authorized Mi Store," ujar perwakilan Xiaomi Indonesia saat dihubungi detikINET.Perusahaan teknologi besutan Lei Jun itu mengatakan permintaan terhadap Redmi Note 8 Pro jauh melebihi perkiraan mereka. Alhasil stok yang telah disiapkan jauh lebih cepat terjual dari perhitungan.Saat ini mereka bersama mitra berupaya mempercepat kedatangan Redmi Note 8 Pro ke Authorized Mi Store. Xiaomi Indonesia memastikan ponsel barunya akan sampai dalam beberapa hari ke depan, paling lambat 11 November 2019. "Kami memahami permintaan konsumen yang telah melakukan pemesanan untuk ketepatan tanggal pengiriman. Dalam upaya untuk memperbaikinya, kami akan menyediakan sebuah tanda terima kasih berupa Mi Dual Driver Earphone dengan cukup membawa invoice pelunasan pre-order pada saat pengambilan Redmi Note 8 Pro. Terima kasih atas pengertian dan kesabarannya," pungkas Xiaomi. Simak Video "YouTube Music Tak Ingin Ambil Porsi Besar untuk Saingi Spotify Cs"[Gambas:Video 20detik](afr/fay)

Xiaomi Respond Redmi Note 8 Pro Difficult To Obtain
06 Nov 2019, 14:55 by Adi Fida Rahman - detikInet


Photo: Adi Fida Rahman / detikinet

Jakarta - Many reports mention that the Redmi Note 8 Pro is hard to come by, even those that have been pre-ordered offline at the store. So what is the word Xiaomi related to this? Xiaomi seems to be aware of it. "We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the late pre-order delivery of the Redmi Note 8 Pro unit at the Authorized Mi Store," the representative of Xiaomi Indonesia said when contacted by detikINET. The technology company made by Lei Jun said the request for Redmi Note 8 Pro far exceeds their expectations. As a result, the stock that has been prepared is sold far faster than the calculation. Currently they and their partners are trying to speed up the arrival of the Redmi Note 8 Pro to the Authorized Mi Store. Xiaomi Indonesia ensures that the new cellphone will arrive in the next few days, no later than November 11, 2019. "We understand the demand of consumers who have placed an order for the exact delivery date. In an effort to improve it, we will provide a token of thanks in the form of Mi Dual Driver Earphone by simply bringing the pre-order payment invoice when taking the Redmi Note 8 Pro. Thank you for your understanding and patience, "concluded Xiaomi.
